channel.title: reproducibility on Alex Kyllo
channel.description: Recent content in reproducibility on Alex Kyllo

item.title: Make Is All You Need
item.description: As a data analyst mostly working with high level languages and GUI tools, I thought of GNU Make as a tool (from 1976!) for building Linux binaries from compiled languages, and it didn’t occur to me how it could be useful in my workflow. Make is usually part of any curriculum for software engineers learning C/C++, but I seldom if ever see it mentioned in data science courses or tutorials.
